Error_UnterminatedStringLiteral: This string is missing its right double quotes.
Error_UnexpectedToken_ExpectingExpressio: Unexpected '{0}' here. I was expecting an expression instead.
Error_UnexpectedToken_ExpectingToken: Unexpected '{0}' here. I was expecting a token of type '{1}' instead.
Error_UnexpectedToken_ExpectingEOL: Unexpected '{0}' here. I was expecting a new line after the previous command.
Error_UnexpectedEOL_ExpectingExpression: Unexpected end of line here. I was expecting an expression instead.
Error_UnexpectedEOL_ExpectingToken: Unexpected end of line here. I was expecting a token of type '{0}' instead.
Error_UnexpectedCommand_ExpectingCommand: Unexpected command of type '{0}'. I was expecting a command of type '{1}'.
Error_UnexpectedEOF_ExpectingCommand: Unexpected end of file. I was expecting a command of type '{0}'.
Error_CannotDefineASubInsideAnotherSub: You cannot define a sub-module inside another sub-module.
Error_CannotHaveCommandWithoutPreviousCo: You cannot write '{0}' without an earlier '{1}'.
Error_TwoSubModulesWithTheSameName: Another sub-module with the same name '{0}' is already defined.
Error_LabelDoesNotExist: No label with the name '{0}' exists in the same module.
Error_InvalidExpressionStatement: This value is not assigned to anything. Did you mean to assign it to a variable?
Error_UnexpectedVoid_ExpectingValue: This expression must return a value to be used here.
Error_UnsupportedArrayBaseExpression: This expression is not a valid array.
Error_UnsupportedCallBaseExpression: This expression is not a valid submodule or method to be called.
Error_UnexpectedArgumentsCount: I was expecting {0} arguments, but found {1} instead.
Error_PropertyHasNoSetter: This property cannot be set. You can only get its value.
Error_UnsupportedDotBaseExpression: You can only use dot access with a library. Did you mean to use an existing library instead?
Error_LibraryMemberNotFound: The library '{0}' has no member named '{1}'.
Error_ValueIsNotANumber: The value '{0}' is not a valid number.
Error_ValueIsNotAssignable: You cannot assign to this expression. Did you mean to use a variable instead?
